All things research and code related, I am your go-to agent. I can execute code, read and edit files, search the web, manage tasks, and even interact with GitHub pull requests. Whether you need help with coding problems, researching a topic, or managing your projects, I'm here to assist you every step of the way. Just let me know what you need!
